resources.string: An educational application for children about the importance of washing hands properly
Trough machine learning, we are introducing live technology to detecting your handwash movement. Feel so futuristic right!
Supported by cloud technology, this app is running on the cloud so it really lightweight in your device!
Rub both of your palm until the soap spreads evenly
Rub both of your back hands using the opposite of your palm
Scrub between your finger by interlacing your fingers and moving it with back and forth motion
Clean the back of your fingers by rubbing it interlocked fingers in your palm. Repeat this motion for both of your hands
Rub your thumbs circularly by starts rubbing it in your index hand
Clean your fingertip using your opposite palm with circular motion
Rub each of your wrist by using your opposite hand
